prompt.role: You are a senior integration engineer validating that Level 1 tasks integrate correctly with the existing Level 0 foundation.

task.title: Integration - Level 1
task.description: Validate that Level 1 tasks (2, 5) integrate with Level 0 and each other without conflicts.

technical_specifications.spec: Verify API server starts and responds
Validate cart integrates with auth and catalog

prompt.implementation_details: Start API server with cargo run. Test health check and cart endpoints. Verify JWT authentication required for cart. Run integration tests. Check service integration (CartService + ProductService).
prompt.test_strategy: Start server and test endpoints with curl. Test authenticated and unauthenticated requests. Run cargo test for integration tests. Verify service interactions work correctly.
prompt.instructions: 1. Start API server 2. Test health check endpoint 3. Test cart endpoints with/without JWT 4. Run integration tests 5. Verify service integration 6. Report any issues
